title: Ray Josh
author: Ray Josh
content: Hello all,Currently, Earbitfun platform has been officially launched and working perfectly. Those who tested the platform during pre-launch already received their 100doge coins equivalent in dollars. Kindly signup and earn while you have fun. Also, if you participated in the testing phase, kindly contact us on our discord channel for your reward. https://discord.gg/jXb9NPW3z4 NB: We will be carrying checks to ascertain those who truly participated in the testing phase.

comments.author: PaulBf1
comments.body: The site did improve significantly from the beta phase; it's running much smoother now. I have one question though. How come a supposedly crypto casino doesn't offer crypto withdrawals ? Are there any plans to add it in the future ?

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: Ray Josh on August 18, 2022, 01:34:59 PMHello all,Currently, Earbitfun platform has been officially launched and working perfectly. Those who tested the platform during pre-launch already received their 100doge coins equivalent in dollars. Kindly signup and earn while you have fun. Also, if you participated in the testing phase, kindly contact us on our discord channel for your reward. https://discord.gg/jXb9NPW3z4 NB: We will be carrying checks to ascertain those who truly participated in the testing phase.It seems that the distribution of free tokens has ended or is not active, or was it only at the testing stage? When I try to turn the apron wheel, I get a message that "Error, you are not in our group!", although I joined the group in discord or additional verification in discord is required, I was just trying to check this possibility.

comments.author: huynhthai12384
comments.body: Quote from: Ray Josh on August 18, 2022, 01:34:59 PMHello all,Currently, Earbitfun platform has been officially launched and working perfectly. Those who tested the platform during pre-launch already received their 100doge coins equivalent in dollars. Kindly signup and earn while you have fun. Also, if you participated in the testing phase, kindly contact us on our discord channel for your reward. https://discord.gg/jXb9NPW3z4 NB: We will be carrying checks to ascertain those who truly participated in the testing phase.I did contacted in Discord with my email n username in old platform but still not received any reward for few days

comments.author: 1empiklaskoco
comments.body: All he said is bullshit, he not even credit my testing balance, discord is very quite, no one will answer you there!

comments.author: PaulBf1
comments.body: I think its safe to say that this website is officially a scam right now. I have sent a dozen of messages in their discord regarding my stuck withdrawal and dm'ed the admin but no response were giving.
